location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Skipp, in Schyrass [Shiraz], to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green

mods.abstract: The letter contains details of the negotiations with the Caun [Karim Khan] and the author's attempts to obtain from him an order to assist the English in their attack on Carrack [Kharg] Island. There is also brief mention of the negotiations with Shaik Nassir [Sheikh NƒÅsir] over the rent of the factory at Bushire.
